an4.213:4.1: “Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.213:4.3: Kāyaduccaritena, vacīduccaritena, manoduccaritena, akataññutā akataveditā—
an4.213:4.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ niraye.
an4.213:5.1: Catūhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge.
an4.213:5.3: Kāyasucaritena, vacīsucaritena, manosucaritena, kataññutā kataveditā—
an4.213:5.4: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catūhi dhammehi samannāgato yathābhataṃ nikkhitto evaṃ sagge”ti.
